text:
Producer, guess what!
I got feedback about the costume!

Someone who actually saw it said it looked beautiful,
like the sky and clouds!

Oh, from someone who saw it in person?
That's nice to hear.

Yeah! It's not just us, but it's great that people
care about the costumes too.
Costumes are part of being an idol, after all!

That's right.
That's why we take fittings seriously.

Yeah yeah!
I'm glad we got to check them properly!

I also want to show everyone
the photos we took that day!

Yeah, I think that's a good idea.
I'm sure the fans would love to see them too.

Do you think so!? Okay then, let's pick out a few!
I want you to help me choose, Producer!
